posts.post_content: I have the following card available after a recent submission I turned in yielded an upgrade.Its a nice SGC 40 example of Bowen from the Portsmouth Truckers.I am asking 52.50 for it and that includes shipping with delivery confirmation.I will also accept a trade of a SGC 40 T210-2 I dont currently own.Paypal preferred but I am willing to accept other forms as well..First post,pm,or email gets it.Thank You.Jason Wells
